Submodules¶

convlab.modules.nlg.multiwoz.evaluate module¶

Evaluate NLG models on sys utterances of Multiwoz test dataset Metric: dataset level BLEU-4, slot error rate Usage: PYTHONPATH=../../../.. python evaluate.py [SCLSTM|MultiwozTemplateNLG]

convlab.modules.nlg.multiwoz.evaluate.get_bleu4(dialog_acts, golden_utts, gen_utts)[source]¶
convlab.modules.nlg.multiwoz.evaluate.get_err_slot(dialog_acts, nlg_model)[source]¶

convlab.modules.nlg.multiwoz.template_nlg module¶

class convlab.modules.nlg.multiwoz.template_nlg.TemplateNLG[source]¶

Bases: convlab.modules.nlg.nlg.NLG

generate(dialog_act)[source]¶

Generate a natural language utterance conditioned on the dialog act produced by Agenda or Policy. :param dialog_act: The dialog act of the following system response. The dialog act can be either produced

by user agenda or system policy module.
Returns:The natural language utterance of the input dialog_act.
Return type:response (str)

Initialization Strategy

convlab.modules.nlg.multiwoz.utils.mergeDicts(d0, d1)[source]¶

for all k in d0, d0 += d1 . d’s are dictionaries of key -> numpy array
